member.name: M:Swank.Configuration.ConfigurationDsl.IsInDebugMode
member.summary: Specifies that Swank is in debug mode. This mode will display template error messages.

member.name: M:Swank.Configuration.ConfigurationDsl.IsInDebugModeWhenAppIsInDebugMode
member.summary: Specifies that Swank is in debug mode when the calling assembly is in debug mode. This mode will display template error messages.

member.name: M:Swank.Configuration.ConfigurationDsl.IgnoreFolders
member.summary: Overrides the configured virtual path provider to ignore physical folders that match Swank urls.

member.name: M:Swank.Configuration.ConfigurationDsl.AppliesTo``1
member.summary: Includes the assembly of the specified type. This call is additive, so you can specify multiple assemblies.

member.name: M:Swank.Configuration.ConfigurationDsl.AppliesTo(System.Type)
member.summary: Includes the assembly of the specified type. This call is additive, so you can specify multiple assemblies..

member.name: M:Swank.Configuration.ConfigurationDsl.AppliesTo(System.Reflection.Assembly[])
member.summary: Includes the specified assemblies.

member.name: M:Swank.Configuration.ConfigurationDsl.WithAppTemplateResource(System.String)
member.summary: Sets a custom app template from an embedded resource. Must be Razor template. If the extension is not specified it must have a .cshtml extension.

member.name: M:Swank.Configuration.ConfigurationDsl.WithAppTemplateFromVirtualPath(System.String)
member.summary: Sets a custom app template from a virtual path. Must be Razor template.

member.name: M:Swank.Configuration.ConfigurationDsl.WithAppTemplate(System.String)
member.summary: Sets a custom app template. Must be Razor template.

member.summary: Url of the specification.

member.summary: Url of the favicon.

member.name: M:Swank.Configuration.ConfigurationDsl.WithPageTitle(System.String)
member.summary: The title of the page. Defaults to the name if not set.

member.summary: The name of the displayed in the page header.

member.name: M:Swank.Configuration.ConfigurationDsl.WithLogoAt(System.String)
member.summary: Url of the logo displayed in the page header.

member.name: M:Swank.Configuration.ConfigurationDsl.AddXmlComments
member.summary: Adds xml comments from the bin folder of the calling assembly. Expects the file name to follow the standard convention of Assembly.xml.

member.name: M:Swank.Configuration.ConfigurationDsl.AddXmlComments(System.String)
member.summary: Adds xml comments from a virtual path.

member.summary: Sets the overview embedded resource. If the extension is not specified it must have a .md extension.

member.summary: Sets the virtual path of the overview.

member.name: M:Swank.Configuration.ConfigurationDsl.WithOverview(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the overview.

member.summary: Adds an overview fragment link. Defaults the fragment to the name snake cased.

member.summary: Adds an overview fragment link.

member.name: M:Swank.Configuration.ConfigurationDsl.WithCopyright(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the copyright which is displayed in the footer of page. The token {year} is replaced by the current year.

member.name: M:Swank.Configuration.ConfigurationDsl.WithStylesheets(System.String[])
member.summary: Specify stylesheets to be included in the documentation page. This can be used to override the appearance of the page. You can use application relative paths a la ~/styles/style.css.

member.name: M:Swank.Configuration.ConfigurationDsl.WithScripts(System.String[])
member.summary: Specify scripts to be included in the documentation page. This can be used to override the behavior of the page. You can use application relative paths a la ~/scripts/script.js.
